messages.subject: Re:Have you seen this movie?
messages.msgSnippet: Oh I loved it, too!  When the Dean started talking, he sounded as though he had read John Taylor Gatto.  )Haven t really read his stuff myself.  Just the
messages.messageBody:
Oh I loved it, too! When the "Dean" started talking, he sounded as
though he had read John Taylor Gatto. )Haven't really read his stuff
myself. Just the Cliff Notes.) My jaw dropped.

Alison

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Have you seen this movie?
messages.msgSnippet: We loved this one too!  Very irreverant and out of the box, which always makes me applaud and smile.   Jodi ... From: Coyote
messages.messageBody:
We loved this one too!  Very irreverant and out of the box, which always makes me applaud and smile.
 
Jodi

--- On Fri, 6/20/08, Coyote <janis@...> wrote:

From: Coyote <janis@...>
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Have you seen this movie?
To: "Jana@..." <jana@...>
Date: Friday, June 20, 2008, 4:43 PM






Brianna & I just finished watching a real fun film, "Accepted". It's about high school kids that are all different and rejected. They start their own college. The curriculum? "What do you want to learn?"
We had a great time watching uncollege! Pick it up, you'll love it!
Janis & Brianna
East Providence, RI
